## Requirement Reference
- **Requirement ID:** FR#LUR-19
- **Source Document:** Requirement/Functional/V1/2#LookupReterival/FR#LUR-19 - Get Job Description Details.md

## Description
System should allow retrieval of job description details.

## Request/Response
- **Request:** ID (int)
- **Response:** ID, JobDescription, IsActive, CreatedDate, ModifiedDate, CreatedBy, ModifiedBy

## User Roles
- Master Admin
- Practice Admin
